content: पुराण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णा|णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पुरा नवं <ls>Nir.</ls>] {@--1@} Old, ancient, belonging to olden times: पुराणमित्येव न साधु सर्वं न चापि काव्यं नवमित्यवद्यं <ls>M. 1. 2</ls>; पुराणपत्रापगमादनंतरं <ls>R. 3. 7.</ls> {@--2@} Aged, primeval; अजो नित्यः शाश्वतोयं पुराणः <ls>Bg. 2. 20.</ls> {@--3@} Decayed, worn out. --णं {@--1@} A past event or occurrence. {@--2@} A tale of the past, legend, ancient or legendary history. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of certain well-known sacred works; these are 19; they are supposed to have been composed by Vyāsa, and contain the whole body of Hindu mythology. A Purāṇa treats of five topics (or लक्षणानि), and is hence often called पंचलक्षण; सर्गश्च प्रतिसर्गश्च वंशो मन्वंतराणि च . वंशानुचरितं चैव पुराणं पंचलक्षणं ... For the names of the 18 Purāṇas see under अष्टादशन्. --णः A coin equal to 80 cowries.
